timeline.bodyText:
I think you should try to optimize the code a bit. You should probably first check the path whether it matches the VOLUME_SIZE path. Only then you should do the lookups.
If you keep using separate method for it, it migth also make more sense to have a method isVolumeSizeChanged instead of using ``isvolumeSizeEqual`. It will make the code more readable.
